title: Whole Wheat Banana Bread
description: A healthy and moist banana bread made with whole wheat flour and natural sweeteners.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 175°C (350°F) and grease a loaf pan.
In a large bowl, mix mashed bananas, honey, coconut oil, eggs, and vanilla extract.
In another bowl, combine whole wheat flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.
Cool completely before slicing and serving.

title: Sandwich Bread
description: Forget supermarket sandwich bread, I bring you the perfect recipe for a healthier and much tastier homemade sandwich bread. It is soft as a pillow inside, the crust is thin and crispy, and the rye flour gives it a unique taste! Rustic, flavorful, and so soft, this bread is perfect for epic sandwiches or simply enjoying with butter.
ingredients: 1 tsp (3 g) fresh yeast or ½ tsp (2 g) dry yeast
instructions: In a bowl, dissolve the yeast in warm water and let it sit for 5-10 minutes until foamy.
Add the plain yogurt, vegetable oil, and salt to the yeast mixture and mix well.
Gradually add the bread flour and rye flour, mixing until a dough forms.
Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 8-10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let it rise in a warm place for 1-2 hours until doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Shape the dough into a loaf and place it in a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until the crust is golden brown and the loaf sounds hollow when tapped.
Let cool before slicing and serving.

title: The New Perfect 4-Ingredient Bread Recipe
description: This recipe brings together a golden crust, an airy crumb, and that unmistakable aroma that fills your home with joy. Each slice is a reminder of how satisfying homemade bread can be, from the first bite to the last.
ingredients: ¾ tsp (3 g) fresh yeast or ½ tsp (2 g) dry yeast
instructions: In a large bowl, dissolve the yeast in warm water and let it sit for 5 minutes until bubbly.
Mix in the salt and gradually add the bread flour, stirring to form a sticky dough.
Cover the bowl with a damp cloth and let the dough rise for 1-2 hours until doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Lightly flour your hands and shape the dough into a round or oval loaf.
Place the loaf on a parchment-lined baking sheet and let it rest for 20-30 minutes.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until the crust is golden brown and the loaf sounds hollow when tapped.
Cool on a wire rack before slicing and enjoying.

title: Poppy Bread
description: Imagine biting into a warm, flaky roll with a crispy crust and a soft, pillowy center. This poppy seed bread is everything you’ve been craving and more! The roasted poppy seeds add a delightful nuttiness, and the aroma while baking will fill your kitchen with pure joy.
ingredients: ¾ tsp (3 g) fresh yeast or ½ tsp (2 g) dry yeast
1½ tbsp (15 g) poppy seeds (plus extra for coating)
instructions: In a bowl, dissolve the yeast in warm water and let it sit for 5-10 minutes until foamy.
Add the salt and poppy seeds, then gradually mix in the bread flour to form a soft dough.
Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 8-10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let it rise for 1-2 hours until doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Divide the dough into small portions and shape into rolls.
Roll each piece in additional poppy seeds for coating and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until the rolls are golden brown and fragrant.
Cool slightly before serving.
